attributes.title: Keep nagging for money
attributes.review: Dear developers, please do not mess with the donations page. Citizens' United makes it clear that money equals voice. I'm sad my voice is so little.

attributes.title: Fun and Effective
attributes.review: Really good app. Easy to use. Well organized. Able to connect easily with like-minded colleagues.

attributes.title: 10 Stars
attributes.review: I wish I could give this app more than 5 stars. Fantastic!

attributes.title: Awesome app! Make America great again with Donald Trump!
attributes.review: This app is pretty cool! All the info on the Trump campaign in one place. Time for Americans to take the country back and send Hillary to prison.

attributes.title: Trump is the Truth
attributes.review: Great app!! Let's stand united and stand up and take our country back!! Home of the Free because of the Brave!! Let's Roll!!

attributes.title: Awesome!
attributes.review: Great way to keep up to date with current news and campaign!

attributes.title: I'm With Trump
attributes.review: Great app. Very simple to use and actually fun. Grab this app to keep up with all the latest Trump/Pence news. Have fun with the Trivia and crossword.

attributes.title: Trump App is Excellent
attributes.review: This app is a wonderful way to stay updated on the people's champ President Trump! I love the point system which makes it really fun üòòüòÇ #MAGA

attributes.title: Best app!
attributes.review: Very informative! Contains everything to keep up-to-date with everything Trump!

attributes.title: Hispanics For Trump
